query.stmt: SELECT U.NAME handler,to_char(T.END_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') handletime,N.NODE_NAME nodename,nvl(T.HANDLE_NOTE,'æ— ') handlenote,F.TITLE HANDLERESULT FROM WF_RU_TASK T,SYS_P_USER U,WF_NODE N,WF_FLOW F WHERE T.HANDLE_MAN_ID = U.ID(+) AND T.NODE_ID = N.ID (+) AND T.HANDLE_ID = F.ID(+) AND T.WORK_ORDER_ID = [woId] AND T.END_TIME IS NOT NULL order by T.END_TIME,T.ID
